official-title.#text:
To direct the Secretary of Agriculture to convey to the Pat Harrison Waterway District
			 approximately 8,307 acres of National Forest System land within the
			 Bienville National Forests in Mississippi, and for other purposes.

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Mid-Mississippi Conservation, Recreation and Development Act of 2014

header.#text: Conveyance to the Pat Harrison Waterway District of the State of Mississippi
